title: Radha Beauty Frankincense Essential Oil 4 oz - 100% Pure & Natural
description: Our 4 oz Frankincense Oil is one of the top essential oils to use for your health. Long revered in the Middle East, this oil is known for its comforting properties and is useful for mental peace and relaxation. The sap is extracted from Boswellia tree bark, hardened into a resin, and put through a steam distillation process to achieve this wonderfully aromatic essential oil. It is anti-inflammatory and has great benefits for your digestive, respiratory, nervous and excretory systems. ﻿Frankincense oil has many immune enhancing abilities to combat harmful bacteria and ailments. It aids in promoting healthy cell regeneration, rehydrates dry skin, helps combat against aging effects, and may reduce the appearance of stretch marks and scars. Used widely in aromatherapy practice, it is also great in meditation sessions to relax, focus, and rebalance the mind.
